headline: Mondelēz International Expands Sustainable Futures Portfolio Aiming to Accelerate Scalable Climate and Community Initiatives
summary: New investments span regenerative agriculture, inclusive financing, and circular packaging ambitions through innovative technology.Investments reflect the company’s three-pronged approach across direct investments, fund investments, and technical assistance to help support bold initiatives.Sustainable Futures focus on circularity, community, and climate aligns with company’s Vision 2030 Sustainability strategy and aims to help people and the planet thrive. CHICAGO, May 29, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE)

headline: Mondelez (MDLZ) Down 2.2% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Rebound?
summary: Mondelez (MDLZ) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.
